import React from 'react' import getDate from "../../data/data" import Avatar from "../../assets/Images/Mohan-muruge.jpg" import SelectEntryStyle from "../../Components/SelectedEntry/SelectedEntry.scss" function SelectedEntry(props) { if (props.entry===null){ return "" } return (
<>

{props.entry.title}

By {props.entry.channel}

{getDate(props.entry.timestamp)}

{props.entry.likes}

{props.entry.views}

{props.entry.description}

{props.entry.comments.length} Comments

{props.entry.comments.map((comment) =>(
  • {comment.name}
  • {comment.comment}
  • {getDate(comment.timestamp)}
))}
{/* */}
) } export default SelectedEntry
